DomainAnnotations
Annotations for domain classes and fields for Domain object persistence mechanism.
DomainAnnotations.Accumulation
Defines accumulation field of - parent - domain class.
DomainAnnotations.Changed
Definitions for version control - changes
DomainAnnotations.Created
Definitions for version control - creation
DomainAnnotations.Removed
Definitions for version control - removal
DomainAnnotations.SqlColumn
For fields of domain classes which are associated to columns: (Non default) column name, NOT NULL and UNIQUE constraint, text length of column associated with field of a domain class
DomainAnnotations.SqlEntryTable
For entry tables which are associated to collection or map fields
DomainAnnotations.SqlTable
For main tables of domain classes: (Non default) table name, UNIQUE constraints and INDEXes of SQL table associated with domain class
DomainAnnotations.UseDataHorizon
For object domain classes: Defines loading strategy for domain class objects by domain controller.
DomainController<T extends DomainObject>
Manages domain object store.
DomainException
Exceptions thrown on domain class registration errors
DomainObject
Base class for objects managed by a domain controller.
FieldError
Error description which will be associated to a field of a specific domain object on problems saving or loading field data to/from database
FkConstraint
Modeling a foreign key constraint for a table column in context of Java2Sql tool
FkConstraint.ConstraintType
 
GuavaReplacements
Helper class for methods originally contained in Google's Guava library and cloned here to avoid dependence on Guava.
GuavaReplacements.CaseFormat

Helpers
Field/column conversion and general helpers
Index
Modeling an index in context of Java2Sql tool
Java2Sql
Java program to generate SQL scripts for generation of persistence database using defined domain classes - for Domain persistence mechanism.
Java2SqlHelpers
Helpers for Java2Sql tool
JdbcHelpers
Internal static JDBC/SQL database helpers, Java/JDBC type conversion
LoadHelpers
Helpers for loading domain objects from database
ObjectNotFoundException
Exception thrown if an object is not contained in object store ('registered') on try to access this object using DomainController.get(Class, long).
Prop
Enhanced property management supporting properties for different runtime environments.
Reflection
Java Reflection helpers.
Registry<T extends DomainObject>
Find and register domain classes.
SaveHelpers
Helpers for saving domain objects to database
SqlConnection
Autoclosable database connection class based on ConnectionPool.
SqlDb
Based on ConnectionPool provides high level methods to perform SQL SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE statements and to CALL Stored Procedures.
SqlDb.DbType
Supported database types: ORACLE, MS_SQL, MYSQL
SqlDbException
Exceptions thrown using SqlDB methods.
SqlDbTable
Objects of this class are associated to SQL database tables and contain table and column meta data.
SqlDomainController
Domain controller DomainController for SQL based persistence mechanism.
SqlDomainObject
Base class for objects managed by SqlDomainController.
SqlRegistry
Singleton to register Java class/SQL table and field/column associations.
Table
Modeling a database table in context of Java2Sql tool
UniqueConstraint
Modeling a unique constraint in context of Java2Sql tool
